amendment.description: To authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act for fiscal year 2007 through 2013, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5224 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S11535) To authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act for fiscal year 2007 through 2013, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5224 proposed by Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5224 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
